name: BULBASAUR
description: If the bud on its back starts to smell sweet, it is evidence that the large flower will soon bloom.

name: IVYSAUR
description: It is able to con- vert sunlight into energy. As a result, it is more powerful in the summertime.

name: VENUSAUR
description: The flame on its tail indicates CHARMANDER's life force. If it is healthy, the flame burns brightly.

name: CHARMANDER
description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

name: CHARMELEON
description: Breathing intense, hot flames, it can melt almost any- thing. Its breath inflicts terrible pain on enemies.

name: CHARIZARD
description: The shell, which hardens soon after it is born, is resilient. If you poke it, it will bounce back out.

name: SQUIRTLE
description: It cleverly con- trols its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.

name: WARTORTLE
description: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punch- ing holes through thick steel.

name: BLASTOISE
description: Its feet have suction cups designed to stick to any surface. It tenaciously climbs trees to forage.

name: CATERPIE
description: It prepares for evolution by har- dening its shell as much as possi- ble to protect its soft body.

name: METAPOD
description: Water-repellent powder on its wings enables it to collect honey, even in the heav- iest of rains.

name: BUTTERFREE
description: It attacks using a two-inch poison barb on its head. It can usually be found under the leaves it eats.

name: WEEDLE
description: From this form, it will grow into an adult. As its body becomes soft- er, the external shell hardens.

name: KAKUNA
description: It has three poison barbs. The barb on its tail secretes the most powerful poison.

name: BEEDRILL
description: Common in grassy areas and forests, it is very docile and will chase off enemies by flap- ping up sand.

name: PIDGEY
description: It immobilizes its prey using well- developed claws, then carries the prey more than 60 miles to its nest.

name: PIDGEOTTO
description: It spreads its beautiful wings wide to frighten its enemies. It can fly at Mach 2 speed.

name: PIDGEOT
description: Living wherever there is food available, it ceaselessly scav- enges for edibles the entire day.

name: RATTATA
description: Its whiskers help it to maintain balance. Its fangs never stop grow- ing, so it gnaws to pare them down.

name: RATICATE
description: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.

name: SPEAROW
description: It cleverly uses its thin, long beak to pluck and eat small insects that hide under the ground.

name: FEAROW
description: It always hides in grass. When first born, it has no poison, so its bite is painful, but harmless.

name: EKANS
description: With a very venge- ful nature, it won't give up the chase, no matter how far, once it targets its prey.

name: ARBOK
description: It raises its tail to check its sur- roundings. The tail is sometimes struck by light- ning in this pose.

name: PIKACHU
description: If the electric pouches in its cheeks become fully charged, both ears will stand straight up.

name: RAICHU
description: Disliking water, it lives in deep burrows in arid areas. It can roll itself instantly into a ball.

name: SANDSHREW
description: If it digs at an incredible pace, it may snap off its spikes and claws. They grow back in a day.

name: SANDSLASH
description: Although not very combative, it will torment its foes with poison spikes if it is threat- ened in any way.

name: NIDORANfE
description: It has a calm and caring nature. Because its horn grows slowly, it prefers not to fight.

name: NIDORINA
description: It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators.

name: NIDOQUEEN
description: It raises its big ears to check its surroundings. It will strike first if it senses any danger.

name: NIDORANmA
description: Quick to anger, it stabs enemies with its horn to inject a powerful poison when it becomes agitated.

name: NIDORINO
description: Its tail is thick and powerful. If it binds an enemy, it can snap the victim's spine quite easily.

name: NIDOKING
description: Its adorable be- havior and cry make it highly popular. However, this cute POKéMON is rarely found.

name: CLEFAIRY
description: Its very sensitive ears lets it dis- tinguish distant sounds. As a re- sult, it prefers quiet places.

name: CLEFABLE
description: If it is attacked by an enemy that is stronger than itself, it feigns injury to fool the enemy and escapes.

name: VULPIX
description: Its nine beautiful tails are filled with a wondrous energy that could keep it alive for 1,000 years.

name: NINETALES
description: Looking into its cute, round eyes causes it to sing a relaxing melody, inducing its enemies to sleep.

name: JIGGLYPUFF
description: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a BODY SLAM.

name: WIGGLYTUFF
description: Capable of flying safely in dark places, it emits ultrasonic cries to check for any obstacles.

name: ZUBAT
description: It can drink more than 10 ounces of blood at once. If it has too much, it gets heavy and flies clumsily.

name: GOLBAT
description: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.

name: ODDISH
description: It secretes a sticky, drool-like honey. Although sweet, it smells too repulsive to get very close.

name: GLOOM
description: The bud bursts into bloom with a bang. It then starts scattering allergenic, poi- sonous pollen.

name: VILEPLUME
description: As its body grows large, oriental mushrooms named tochukaso start sprouting out of its back.

name: PARAS
description: The larger the mushroom on its back grows, the stronger the mush- room spores it scatters.

name: PARASECT
description: Poison oozes from all over its body. It catches and eats small bugs at night that are at- tracted by light.

name: VENONAT
description: The powder on its wings is poisonous if it is dark in color. If it is light, it causes paralysis.

name: VENOMOTH
description: If a DIGLETT DIGS through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.

name: DIGLETT
description: Extremely power- ful, they can DIG through even the hardest ground to a depth of over 60 miles.

name: DUGTRIO
description: It loves anything that shines. It especially adores coins that it picks up and se- cretly hoards.

name: MEOWTH
description: Its lithe muscles allow it to walk without making a sound. It attacks in an instant.

name: PERSIAN
description: If its chronic headache peaks, it may exhibit odd powers. It seems unable to recall such an episode.

name: PSYDUCK
description: It appears by waterways at dusk. It may use tele- kinetic powers if its forehead glows mysteriously.

name: GOLDUCK
description: It's unsafe to ap- proach if it gets violently enraged for no reason and can't distinguish friends from foes.

name: MANKEY
description: It becomes wildly furious if it even senses someone looking at it. It chases anyone that meets its glare.

name: PRIMEAPE
description: Extremely loyal, it will fearlessly bark at any oppo- nent to protect its own trainer from harm.

name: GROWLITHE
description: Its magnificent bark conveys a sense of majesty. Anyone hearing it can't help but grovel before it.

name: ARCANINE
description: The direction of its belly spiral differs by area. The equator is thought to have an effect on this.

name: POLIWAG
description: The skin on most of its body is moist. However, the skin on its belly spiral feels smooth.

name: POLIWHIRL
description: Although an ener- getic, skilled swimmer that uses all of its mus- cles, it lives on dry land.

name: POLIWRATH
description: If it decides to TELEPORT randomly, it creates the illusion that it has created copies of itself.

name: ABRA
description: If it uses its abilities, it emits special alpha waves that cause machines to malfunction.

name: KADABRA
description: Its brain cells multiply continu- ally until it dies. As a result, it remembers everything.

name: ALAKAZAM
description: It loves to work out and build its muscles. It is never satisfied, even if it trains hard all day long.

name: MACHOP
description: The muscles cover- ing its body teem with power. Even when still, it exudes an amazing sense of strength.

name: MACHOKE
description: It uses its four powerful arms to pin the limbs of its foe, then throws the victim over the horizon.

name: MACHAMP
description: It plants its feet deep underground to replenish wa- ter. It can't es- cape its enemy while it's rooted.

name: BELLSPROUT
description: If its prey is bigger than its mouth, it slices up the victim with sharp leaves, then eats every morsel.

name: WEEPINBELL
description: This horrifying plant POKéMON at- tracts prey with aromatic honey, then melts them in its mouth.

name: VICTREEBEL
description: It drifts aimless- ly in waves. Very difficult to see in water, it may not be noticed until it stings.

name: TENTACOOL
description: In battle, it extends all 80 of its tentacles to entrap its oppo- nent inside a poisonous net.

name: TENTACRUEL
description: It uses its arms to steadily climb steep mountain paths. It swings its fists around if angered.

name: GEODUDE
description: A slow walker, it rolls to move. It pays no attention to any object that happens to be in its path.

name: GRAVELER
description: It is capable of blowing itself up. It uses this explosive force to jump from mountain to mountain.

name: GOLEM
description: Its hind legs, which have hard- er-than-diamond hooves, kick back at any presence it senses behind it.

name: PONYTA
description: With incredible acceleration, it reaches its top speed of 150 mph after running just ten steps.

name: RAPIDASH
description: A sweet sap leaks from its tail's tip. Although not nutritious, the tail is pleasant to chew on.

name: SLOWPOKE
description: Naturally dull to begin with, it lost its ability to feel pain due to SHELLDER's seeping poison.

name: SLOWBRO
description: The units at the sides of its body generate anti- gravity energy to keep it aloft in the air.

name: MAGNEMITE
description: The MAGNEMITE are united by a mag- netism so power- ful, it dries all moisture in its vicinities.

name: MAGNETON
description: If it eats the plant stick it carries as emer- gency rations, it runs off in search of a new stick.

name: FARFETCH'D
description: It races through grassy plains with powerful strides, leaving footprints up to four inches deep.

name: DODUO
description: If one of the heads gets to eat, the others will be satisfied, too, and they will stop squabbling.

name: DODRIO
description: In daytime, it is often found asleep on the seabed in shallow waters. Its nostrils close while it swims.

name: SEEL
description: It loves frigid seas with ice floes. It uses its long tail to change swimming direction quickly.

name: DEWGONG
description: Wherever GRIMER has passed, so many germs are left behind that no plants will ever grow again.

name: GRIMER
description: Its body is made of a powerful poi- son. Touching it accidentally will cause a fever that requires bed rest.

name: MUK
description: Grains of sand trapped in its shells mix with its body fluids to form beautiful pearls.

name: SHELLDER
description: CLOYSTER that live in seas with harsh tidal currents grow large, sharp spikes on their shells.

name: CLOYSTER
description: Its thin body is made of gas. It can envelop an opponent of any size and cause suffocation.

name: GASTLY
description: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death even- tually comes.

name: HAUNTER
description: To steal the life of its target, it slips into the prey's shadow and silently waits for an opportunity.

name: GENGAR
description: It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its mas- sive, rugged body.

name: ONIX
description: It remembers every dream it eats. It rarely eats the dreams of adults because children's are much tastier.

name: DROWZEE
description: Always holding a pendulum that it rocks at a steady rhythm, it causes drowsiness in any- one nearby.

name: HYPNO
description: The pincers break off easily. If it loses a pincer, it somehow becomes incapable of walk- ing sideways.

name: KRABBY
description: Its pincers grow peculiarly large. If it lifts the pincers too fast, it loses its bal- ance and staggers.

name: KINGLER
description: It was discovered when POKé BALLS were introduced. It is said that there is some connection.

name: VOLTORB
description: It stores an over- flowing amount of electric energy inside its body. Even a small shock makes it explode.

name: ELECTRODE
description: Using telepathy only they can receive, they always form a cluster of six EXEGGCUTE.

name: EXEGGCUTE
description: If a head drops off, it emits a telepathic call in search of others to form an EXEGGCUTE cluster.

name: EXEGGUTOR
description: It always wears the skull of its dead mother, so no one has any idea what its hidden face looks like.

name: CUBONE
description: It collects bones from an unknown place. A MAROWAK graveyard exists somewhere in the world, rumors say.

name: MAROWAK
description: If it starts kick- ing repeatedly, both legs will stretch even long- er to strike a fleeing foe.

name: HITMONLEE
description: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.

name: HITMONCHAN
description: Its long tongue, slathered with a gooey saliva, sticks to any- thing, so it is very useful.

name: LICKITUNG
description: The poisonous gases it contains are a little bit lighter than air, keeping it slight- ly airborne.

name: KOFFING
description: Top-grade perfume is made using its internal poison gases by diluting them to the high- est level.

name: WEEZING
description: It doesn't care if there is anything in its way. It just charges and destroys all ob- stacles.

name: RHYHORN
description: Its brain devel- oped when it began walking on hind legs. Its thick hide protects it even in magma.

name: RHYDON
description: Few in number and difficult to cap- ture, it is said to bring happiness to the trainer who catches it.

name: CHANSEY
description: It tangles any moving thing with its vines. Their subtle shaking is ticklish if you get ensnared.

name: TANGELA
description: To protect its young, it will never give up during battle, no matter how badly wounded it is.

name: KANGASKHAN
description: Its big, developed fins move rapidly, allowing it to swim backward while still facing forward.

name: HORSEA
description: Its fin-tips leak poison. Its fins and bones are highly valued as ingredients in herbal medicine.

name: SEADRA
description: A strong swimmer, it is capable of swimming nonstop up fast streams at a steady speed of five knots.

name: GOLDEEN
description: Using its horn, it bores holes in riverbed boulders, making nests to prevent its eggs from washing away.

name: SEAKING
description: Even if its body is torn, it can regenerate as long as the glowing central core re- mains intact.

name: STARYU
description: Regardless of the environment it lives in, its body grows to form a symmetrical geo- metric shape.

name: STARMIE
description: Its fingertips emit a peculiar force field that hardens air to create an actual wall.

name: MR. MIME
description: When it moves, it leaves only a blur. If it hides in grass, its pro- tective colors make it invisible.

name: SCYTHER
description: It speaks a lan- guage similar to that of humans. However, it seems to use dancing to communicate.

name: JYNX
description: Its body constant- ly discharges electricity. Get- ting close to it will make your hair stand on end.

name: ELECTABUZZ
description: The fiery surface of its body gives off a wavering, rippling glare that is similar to the sun.

name: MAGMAR
description: Swings its long antlers wildly to attack. During cold periods, it hides deep in forests.

name: PINSIR
description: After heightening its will to fight by whipping itself with its three tails, it charges at full speed.

name: TAUROS
description: For no reason, it jumps and splashes about, making it easy for predators like PIDGEOTTO to catch it mid-jump.

name: MAGIKARP
description: Once it appears, it goes on a ram- page. It remains enraged until it demolishes every- thing around it.

name: GYARADOS
description: It ferries people across the sea on its back. It may sing an enchanting cry if it is in a good mood.

name: LAPRAS
description: Its transformation ability is per- fect. However, if made to laugh, it can't maintain its disguise.

name: DITTO
description: Its irregularly configured DNA is affected by its surroundings. It evolves if its en- vironment changes.

name: EEVEE
description: It prefers beauti- ful shores. With cells similar to water molecules, it could melt in water.

name: VAPOREON
description: Every hair on its body starts to stand sharply on end if it becomes charged with electricity.

name: JOLTEON
description: It fluffs out its fur collar to cool down its body temperature, which can reach 1,650 degrees.

name: FLAREON
description: A manmade POKéMON that came about as a result of re- search. It is pro- grammed with only basic motions.

name: PORYGON
description: This POKéMON from ancient times is said to have navi- gated the sea by adeptly twisting its 10 tentacles.

name: OMANYTE
description: Once wrapped around its prey, it never lets go. It eats the prey by tearing at it with sharp fangs.

name: OMASTAR
description: This POKéMON lived in ancient times. On rare occasions, it has been discovered as a living fossil.

name: KABUTO
description: With sharp claws, this ferocious, ancient POKéMON rips apart prey and sucks their body fluids.

name: KABUTOPS
description: This vicious POKé- MON is said to have flown in an- cient skies while shrieking high- pitched cries.

name: AERODACTYL
description: Its stomach's di- gestive juices can dissolve any kind of poison. It can even eat things off the ground.

name: SNORLAX
description: One of the legen- dary bird POKéMON, it chills moisture in the atmosphere to create snow while flying.

name: ARTICUNO
description: This legendary bird POKéMON is said to appear only when a thun- dercloud parts into two halves.

name: ZAPDOS
description: This legendary bird POKéMON is said to bring early spring to the wintry lands it visits.

name: MOLTRES
description: This POKéMON is full of life ener- gy. It continually sheds its skin and grows steadily larger.

name: DRATINI
description: Its crystalline orbs appear to give this POKéMON the power to freely control the weather.

name: DRAGONAIR
description: This marine POKé- MON has an impres- sive build that lets it freely fly over raging seas without trouble.

name: DRAGONITE
description: It usually remains motionless to con- serve energy, so that it may un- leash its full power in battle.

name: MEWTWO
description: Its DNA is said to contain the genet- ic codes of all POKéMON, so it can use all kinds of techniques.

name: MEW
description: Its pleasantly aromatic leaves have the ability to check the hu- midity and tem- perature.

name: CHIKORITA
description: A spicy aroma ema- nates from around its neck. The aroma acts as a stimulant to re- store health.

name: BAYLEEF
description: MEGANIUM's breath has the power to revive dead grass and plants. It can make them healthy again.

name: MEGANIUM
description: It usually stays hunched over. If it is angry or surprised, it shoots flames out of its back.

name: CYNDAQUIL
description: This POKéMON is fully covered by nonflammable fur. It can withstand any kind of fire attack.

name: QUILAVA
description: It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blaz-  ing fur together to cause huge explosions.

name: TYPHLOSION
description: It is small but rough and tough. It won't hesitate to take a bite out of anything that moves.

name: TOTODILE
description: It opens its huge jaws wide when attacking. If it loses any fangs while biting, they grow back in.

name: CROCONAW
description: It is hard for it to support its own weight out of water, so it gets down on all fours. But it moves fast.

name: FERALIGATR
description: It stands on its tail so it can see a long way. If it spots an enemy, it cries loudly to warn its kind.

name: SENTRET
description: There is no tell- ing where the tail begins. Despite its short legs, it is quick at hunt- ing RATTATA.

name: FURRET
description: It has a perfect sense of time. Whatever happens, it keeps rhythm by precisely tilting its head in time.

name: HOOTHOOT
description: When it needs to think, it rotates its head 180 de- grees to sharpen its intellectual power.

name: NOCTOWL
description: When the weather turns cold, lots of LEDYBA gather from everywhere to cluster and keep each other warm.

name: LEDYBA
description: The star patterns on its back grow larger or smaller depending on the number of stars in the night sky.

name: LEDIAN
description: It spins a web using fine--but durable--thread. It then waits pa- tiently for prey to be trapped.

name: SPINARAK
description: A single strand of a special string is endlessly spun out of its rear. The string leads back to its nest.

name: ARIADOS
description: The development of wings on its legs enables it to fly fast but also makes it tough to stop and rest.

name: CROBAT
description: On the dark ocean floor, its only means of communi- cation is its constantly flash- ing lights.

name: CHINCHOU
description: It blinds prey with an intense burst of light, then swallows the immobilized prey in a single gulp.

name: LANTURN
description: Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself.

name: PICHU
description: When numerous me- teors illuminate the night sky, sightings of CLEFFA strangely increase.

name: CLEFFA
description: Its extremely flexible and elas- tic body makes it bounce continuous- ly--anytime, any- where.

name: IGGLYBUFF
description: A proverb claims that happiness will come to any- one who can make a sleeping TOGEPI stand up.

name: TOGEPI
description: It grows dispirit- ed if it is not with kind people. It can float in midair without moving its wings.

name: TOGETIC
description: It usually forages for food on the ground but may, on rare occasions, hop onto branches to peck at shoots.

name: NATU
description: In South America, it is said that its right eye sees the future and its left eye views the past.

name: XATU
description: Its fleece grows continually. In the summer, the fleece is fully shed, but it grows back in a week.

name: MAREEP
description: Its fluffy fleece easily stores electricity. Its rubbery hide keeps it from being electrocuted.

name: FLAAFFY
description: The bright light on its tail can be seen far away. It has been treasured since ancient times as a beacon.

name: AMPHAROS
description: Plentiful in the tropics. When it dances, its petals rub together and make a pleasant ringing sound.

name: BELLOSSOM
description: The end of its tail serves as a buoy that keeps it from drowning, even in a vicious current.

name: MARILL
description: When it plays in water, it rolls up its elongated ears to prevent their insides from get- ting wet.

name: AZUMARILL
description: It disguises it- self as a tree to avoid attack. It hates water, so it will disappear if it starts raining.

name: SUDOWOODO
description: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.

name: POLITOED
description: Its body is so light, it must grip the ground firmly with its feet to keep from being blown away.

name: HOPPIP
description: It spreads its petals to absorb sunlight. It also floats in the air to get closer to the sun.

name: SKIPLOOM
description: Drifts on seasonal winds and spreads its cotton-like spores all over the world to make more offspring.

name: JUMPLUFF
description: It lives atop tall trees. When leap- ing from branch to branch, it deftly uses its tail for balance.

name: AIPOM
description: It lives by drink- ing only dewdrops from under the leaves of plants. It is said that it eats nothing else.

name: SUNKERN
description: In the daytime, it rushes about in a hectic manner, but it comes to a com- plete stop when the sun sets.

name: SUNFLORA
description: Its large eyes can scan 360 degrees. It looks in all directions to seek out insects as its prey.

name: YANMA
description: When it walks a- round on the ground, it coats its body with a slimy, poisonous film.

name: WOOPER
description: Due to its relaxed and carefree atti- tude, it often bumps its head on boulders and boat hulls as it swims.

name: QUAGSIRE
description: By reading air currents, it can predict things such as the weath- er or its foe's next move.

name: ESPEON
description: When darkness falls, the rings on the body begin to glow, striking fear in the hearts of anyone nearby.

name: UMBREON
description: It is said that when chased, it lures its attacker onto dark mountain trails where the foe will get lost.

name: MURKROW
description: When its head was bitten, toxins entered SLOWPOKE's head and unlocked an extraordinary power.

name: SLOWKING
description: It loves to bite and yank people's hair from behind without warning, just to see their shocked reactions.

name: MISDREAVUS
description: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some mean- ing.

name: UNOWN
description: To keep its pitch- black tail hidden, it lives quietly in the darkness. It is never first to attack.

name: WOBBUFFET
description: Its tail, which also contains a small brain, may bite on its own if it notices an alluring smell.

name: GIRAFARIG
description: It hangs and waits for flying insect prey to come near. It does not move about much on its own.

name: PINECO
description: It remains immova- bly rooted to its tree. It scatters pieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away.

name: FORRETRESS
description: If spotted, it es- capes by burrowing with its tail. It can float just slightly using its wings.

name: DUNSPARCE
description: It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.

name: GLIGAR
description: It is said that if an ONIX lives for over 100 years, its composition changes to become diamond-like.

name: STEELIX
description: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its af- fectionate ways.

name: SNUBBULL
description: Because its fangs are too heavy, it always keeps its head tilted down. However, its BITE is powerful.

name: GRANBULL
description: The small spikes covering its body developed from scales. They in- ject a toxin that causes fainting.

name: QWILFISH
description: Its wings are not used for flying. They are flapped at high speed to adjust its body temperature.

name: SCIZOR
description: It stores BERRIES inside its shell. To avoid attacks, it hides beneath rocks and remains completely still.

name: SHUCKLE
description: Usually docile, but if disturbed while sipping honey, it chases off the intruder with its horn.

name: HERACROSS
description: Vicious in nature, it drives PIDGEY from their nests and feasts on the eggs that are left behind.

name: SNEASEL
description: Before food be- comes scarce in wintertime, its habit is to hoard food in many hid- den locations.

name: TEDDIURSA
description: With its ability to distinguish any aroma, it unfail- ingly finds all food buried deep underground.

name: URSARING
description: A common sight in volcanic areas, it slowly slithers around in a con- stant search for warm places.

name: SLUGMA
description: Its brittle shell occasionally spouts intense flames that cir- culate throughout its body.

name: MAGCARGO
description: If it smells some- thing enticing, it dashes headlong off to find the source of the aroma.

name: SWINUB
description: If it charges at an enemy, the hairs on its back stand up straight. It is very sensi- tive to sound.

name: PILOSWINE
description: In a south sea nation, the people live in communi- ties that are built on groups of these POKéMON.

name: CORSOLA
description: Using its dorsal fin as a suction pad, it clings to a MANTINE's under- side to scavenge for leftovers.

name: REMORAID
description: It instinctively sneaks into rocky holes. If it gets sleepy, it steals the nest of a fel- low OCTILLERY.

name: OCTILLERY
description: It nests at the edge of sharp cliffs. It spends all day carrying food to its await- ing chicks.

name: DELIBIRD
description: Swimming freely in open seas, it may fly out of the water and over the waves if it builds up enough speed.

name: MANTINE
description: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.

name: SKARMORY
description: To corner prey, they check each other's location using barks that only they can understand.

name: HOUNDOUR
description: Upon hearing its eerie howls, other POKéMON get the shivers and head straight back to their nests.

name: HOUNDOOM
description: It sleeps deep on the ocean floor to build its energy. It is said to cause tornadoes as it wakes.

name: KINGDRA
description: As a sign of af- fection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.

name: PHANPY
description: The longer and bigger its tusks, the higher its rank in its herd. The tusks take long to grow.

name: DONPHAN
description: Further research enhanced its abil- ities. Sometimes, it may exhibit motions that were not programmed.

name: PORYGON2
description: Those who stare at its antlers will gradually lose control of their senses and be unable to stand.

name: STANTLER
description: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.

name: SMEARGLE
description: Even though it is small, it can't be ignored because it will slug any handy target with- out warning.

name: TYROGUE
description: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.

name: HITMONTOP
description: It always rocks its head slowly backwards and for- wards as if it is trying to kiss someone.

name: SMOOCHUM
description: Even in the most vicious storm, this POKéMON plays happily if thunder rumbles in the sky.

name: ELEKID
description: It is found in volcanic craters. Its body temp. is over 1100 degrees, so don't under- estimate it.

name: MAGBY
description: If it has just had a baby, the milk it produces con- tains much more nutrition than usual.

name: MILTANK
description: It has a very com- passionate nature. If it sees a sick POKéMON, it will nurse the sufferer back to health.

name: BLISSEY
description: A POKéMON that races across the land while barking a cry that sounds like crashing thunder.

name: RAIKOU
description: A POKéMON that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.

name: ENTEI
description: This POKéMON races across the land. It is said that north winds will somehow blow when- ever it appears.

name: SUICUNE
description: It is born deep underground. It can't emerge until it has entirely consumed the soil around it.

name: LARVITAR
description: Even sealed in its shell, it can move freely. Hard and fast, it has out- standing destruc- tive power.

name: PUPITAR
description: Extremely strong, it can change the landscape. It has an insolent nature that makes it not care about others.

name: TYRANITAR
description: It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm.

name: LUGIA
description: A legend says that its body glows in seven colors. A rainbow is said to form behind it when it flies.

name: HO-OH
description: When CELEBI disap- pears deep in a forest, it is said to leave behind an egg it brought from the future.
